mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT awardOfWinOrBig, awardOfLoseOrSmall, handicap, baseBigOrSmall, playType FROM sporttery_basketball_award WHERE playType = 0 AND matchId = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY lastUpdateTime DESC LIMIT 1) AS sp1
UNION
SELECT * FROM (SELECT awardOfWinOrBig, awardOfLoseOrSmall, handicap, baseBigOrSmall, playType FROM sporttery_basketball_award WHERE playType = 2 AND matchId = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY lastUpdateTime DESC LIMIT 1) AS sp2
UNION
SELECT * FROM (SELECT awardOfWinOrBig, awardOfLoseOrSmall, handicap, baseBigOrSmall, playType FROM sporttery_basketball_award WHERE playType = 3 AND matchId = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY lastUpdateTime DESC LIMIT 1) AS sp3
